sections.title: Society of Smooth - Next Gen Waxing
sections.description: Our signature roll-on cartridge system ensures a thin, even layer of wax is applied at the perfect temperature. Each cartridge is single-use, guaranteeing the highest level of hygiene.

sections.title: B-Wax: Stripless Brazilian & Intimate Waxing
sections.description: A painless and soothing procedure for intimate areas. Our Pink & Gold stripless wax granules are infused with brightening serum to reduce dark patches and are ideal for sensitive skin.
